mapper.insert: INSERT INTO novel_section_tb (novel_id, title, content, list_price, current_price) VALUES (#{novelId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{listPrice}, #{currentPrice});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT id,novel_id,title,content,created_at,recommend, favorite,views,list_price,current_price, LAG(id, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY id ASC) AS prev_id, LAG(title, 1, '이전글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY id) AS prev_title, LEAD(id, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY id ASC) AS next_id, LEAD(title, 1, '다음글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY id) AS next_title FROM novel_section_tb where novel_id = ${novelId} ) sub_tb where id = ${sectionId} ORDER BY id desc;
